question: On the first episode (which aired on September 23rd) of the seventeenth season of America's "The Voice" a contestant sang a song whose album cover shows a man wearing a hood.  Who sang this same song on the TV show "Sons of Anarchy"?
context: "Make It Rain" is a song by Northern Irish musician Foy Vance. It was made famous by Ed Sheeran in 2014 when it was used in the television series Sons of Anarchy.
